treatment system. Indirect potable reuse (IPR): Augmentation of a drinking water source (surface
or groundwater) with reclaimed water followed by an environmental buffer that precedes
drinking water treatment. Nonpotable reuse: All water reuse applications that do not involve
potable reuse. Potable reuse: Planned augmentation of a drinking water supply with reclaimed
water … Water reuse: The use of treated municipal wastewater (reclaimed water) … Reclaimed
